text: "Les rues de ma peine" is a song performed by French-Israeli singer Amir Haddad. The song was released as a digital download on 9 February 2018 as the second single from his third studio album Addictions (2017). The song has peaked at number 63 on the French Singles Chart and also charted in Belgium. ==Commercial performance== On 17 February 2018, the song entered the French Singles Chart at number 166, peaking at number 63. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Les rues de ma peine" was first released onto YouTube on 9 February 2018 at a total length of three minutes and forty- six seconds. It was filmed in Hong Kong. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! Chart (2018) !
